website_summaries.verdict: Gaming keyboard that provides an ergonomic layout for safe use over long periods of time.
pros: Includes a built-in mouse pad on the right for the most convenient setup, although you can disconnect the pad
Keyboard has high-end backlighting features that you can configure to meet your needs
cons: Some find key responsiveness a little disappointing considering the higher price

customer_reviews.title: but this is perfectly fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a decent couch/home theater gaming solution for a long time, and this is finally it. No idea if the mechanical version is worth more, but this is perfectly fine for me. I use an xbox controller for most games, but this opened up 95% of my steam library to the only way I play games anymore. Seems well built and is comfortable to use. I do wish it were wireless, but I keep the wire tucked under my couch when I'm not using it. FYI it does not come with a mouse -- this wasn't made very clear when I did my research.
customer_reviews.author: epj3

customer_reviews.title: Really Big. Great Keys.
customer_reviews.text: Using this with my intel NUC i5. Works great. Monitor is my 65 LG OLED. This Roccat is big and easy to type on. Very large mousing area. If you’re a smaller person you might disappear under this thing! Cord comfortably long to reach my audio / video cabinet. No batteries or Bluetooth failures to worry about. LEDs are bright and a bunch of cool keyboard effects can be selected. Seems very solid. Reminds me of my younger days when *all* keyboards had a solid mechanical action. Now it’s a pricey novelty. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: The lapboard is awesome. The major issue I have is a defective cable that I have tried to get replaced. It has been two months since they (the manufacture) said the cable replacement was on its way. Very slow or no answer from customer service when requesting cable replacement status. Might need to buy another lapboard from somewhere else. Very disappointed! Great lapboard until it fails then its just a useless brick since you can get no warrenty replacement help from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for couch MMO gaming
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could play Final Fantasy XIV on my PS4 Pro from a comfortable distance from my TV. It is a great keyboard and it works flawlessly with PC or PS4. Just a side note: FFXIV runs better on my PS4 Pro than my old gaming PC, so I recommend this route for upgrading from base PS4, or if you want 60FPS FFXIV on a system that is 1/4 the price of a gaming PC.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works well paired with Steam Link
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain, works flawlessly paired to my Link for gaming in the front room without having to build an HTPC. Yes the mouse area is smooth, but you can just place a mouse pad on it. The wired is best cause you don't have to worry about a charge when playing. I had originally purchased the Corsair lapboard, but the wireless was spotty AND it didn't have a USB plug for the mouse, like the Roccat one does. Very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sofa use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother to use in the living room and he's loving it. He used the coffee table before and would start feeling some back pain. With this lapboard he's so damn comfortable and can play on it for hours. I tried it out a few times and really like it. The padding on the bottom is good enough but could've been a bit better with more of the bottom being cushioned. The cable that plugs into the PC should be long enough for most living room set ups.
customer_reviews.author: EddieDDUB

customer_reviews.title: There was some weirdness with the software early on but it seems like the latest updates have ironed all that out
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. No more hunching over a monitor. I can sit in my comfy chair and play PC games on my giant 4K tv. There was some weirdness with the software early on but it seems like the latest updates have ironed all that out. I now only regret not spending the extra scratch on the mechanical version.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beautiful beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful product, they even seem to of given me a free upgrade when I got it. I ordered the membrane version but received the mechanical version under the same price. I don’t know if that was a mistake or if this is the only thing they had in stock but they gained a customer for life from meh absolutely beautiful product, they even seem to of given me a free upgrade when I got it. I ordered the membrane version but received the mechanical version under the same price. I don’t know if that was a mistake or if this is the only thing they had in stock but they gave a customer for life from me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Mechanical keyboard is a delight to type on
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Mechanical keyboard is a delight to type on. Mouse area is big enough for gaming and browsing. It has a little holder for your mouse cord so it doesnt go falling off if the mouse skates off the side. Only thing is it says you can add wrist wrests for the keyboard and swap out the mousing surface but they havnt been produced for it. -1 star for not making the wrist rests.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Rattling Gourd

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses every expectation
customer_reviews.text: A quick Google search for reviews of this device will tell you more than I ever could about how great this thing is. So I'll keep it simple: it's *exactly* everything I conceived of wanting in a gaming lap-board. Super high-quality, with a nice heft, a great mechanical keyboard (not sure what the nay-sayers were using, but it wasn't this), and everything just really well-thought-out. The pads on the bottom are even nicely spaced out. I suppose my one quibble is the software+lighting -- the light level options are limited so the effect of some keys lit more than others is never particularly dramatic. But it's all a nice glowing blue, so I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly effective.
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive, yes, but it is worth every penny and more, extremely comfortable for long gaming sessions, perfect for playing in your living room. I really couldn't recommend this item any more highly. Roccat did a great job, only complaint is the cable is proprietary and my dog chewed it up and so I'm not sure I'll be able to get a replacement cable yet... :(
customer_reviews.author: Mayonaise

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, poor tech support.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard, I'm deducting two stars as my top 0 key is recessed a little. It still functions but it's lower than the rest. As opposed to sending the keyboard back, I sent Roccat a tech support request. It has been two weeks and I still have not heard from them. I'm thrilled with the keyboard, but not with their tech support.
customer_reviews.author: S&A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Just plain awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best solution to playing M&K PC games on your TV. Works perfectly with my PC and the mechanical keys feel great. Definitely worth the upgrade! Before this I was dragging over a folding table and computer chair, setting up a keyboard and mouse, effectively and blocking all the foot traffic in my house. Now I just grab the keyboard and my mouse and chill out on the couch!
customer_reviews.author: Seth D.

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 starts but missing key elements
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 starts if the mouse pad was an actual mouse pad and not plastic. The website shows that the mouse and piece in front of the keyboard come off. I thought they would sell replacement parts - better house pad and possibly write support? But I haven't seen anything come out yet. I really think those items should have just come with it to begin with - for the steep price tag. But, it's still cool to game from the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An awesome way to play PC games on the couch!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely sized due to the tenkeyless keyboard and generous mouse space, this lapboard is a great choice for playing PC games from your couch using Keyboard and Mouse. It's well built, comfortable in your lap, and the keyboard feels great to use. My only gripe is that there still isn't a great way of keeping your mouse still if it's wireless, but using a wired mouse can solve this issue due to the cable routing points on the bottom and back of the lapboard. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I made this year
customer_reviews.text: Works great, love the mouse wire clip, isn't loud when typing, super comfy on legs for extended periods. So why then do I dock it 1 star? False advertising, no phone holder attachment comes with it or is even sold separately as the roccat site claims.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great for couch or bed gaming
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Really opens up more playing/working options. Arm chairs, couches, beds.. it's awesome. My only gripe is the mouse cable management is not as good as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Weston M

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but has some issues
customer_reviews.text: Really great keyboard... Good mechanical feel, although with the hand angle you have when playing this keyboard on your lap the keys could be a bit lighter. Could REALLY use a wrist rest on the mouse pad section.... Expect a red wrist after a few hours of gaming. Bit irritated that the keyboard doesn't power on right at boot, requiring a second keyboard to get into the BIOS. I would love to see a wireless version in the future. Oh... And for that much money... No RGB?!?
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Grzelaczyk

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product if you have a 4k tv and a ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product if you have a 4k tv and a solid build but you're getting old and you dont wanna game on the chair when you're playing single player games like doom or fallout, and oh if you hate controllers too. however its kinda large and might make you take half the couch to yourself. wife might not be so happy :P
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this thing very much
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit. I just finished my man cave and this thing completed it. Two USB ports on it, so you can use a USB headset and mouse. I enjoy this thing very much. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I only wish it had a numpad
customer_reviews.text: I know the keys aren't up to the standards of most mechanical enthusiasts, but they work perfectly fine for me. I only wish it had a numpad.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Is that cool or what
customer_reviews.text: Instead of playing games or anything at my computer desk I'm on my couch. Is that cool or what?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard being offset to the left is very annoying when you're trying to type. Still a better design than the Corsair lapdog.
customer_reviews.author: Miguelito

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect for Couch Gaming
customer_reviews.text: The product works great for couch gaming. No lag issues with the keyboard and the software was a fast install.
customer_reviews.author: ReRe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after 2.5 years the keys started not working. They'd either do nothing or yield multiple strokes for one. Unusable. Was good while it lasted, now going in the trash because there's no way to fix it. I removed all the keys and thoroughly cleaned it but it made no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly for what it is
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for what it is. I'd like to say it'd be nice to have a cloth mouse pad but considering it's used on the couch it'd probably get dirty. Wireless would be a plus, but it's okay without it.
customer_reviews.author: dylan lafont

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard itself is great, IF you can download the SWARM app to ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is great, IF you can download the SWARM app to run it and IF the swarm app recognizes the keyboad. Tech support is like turning a page in a book back and forth - all you get is the same that's in the forums. Seem their mouses have the same problem with their great swarm app. No trust left in Roccat.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky Gates

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great idea
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great idea. The app and it's firmware is a pain and then some. If you don't care about the lights or customizing mouse buttons...it's great. Took 4 reinstall to finally update the firmware for the swarm app to recognize and configure the keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.author: MariaK

customer_reviews.title: Great setup for couch gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great setup for couch gaming, use it with my PS4/Xim 4 and Steam Link. Went with the Membrane version over the Mechanical, and it doesn't disappoint at all. Hope one day we get a wireless version of this.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you keep your mouse from falling. Then alls good
customer_reviews.text: Great product for playing Overwatch on my couch. I sometimes put it on my desk and i like how the mouse stays on the pad and doesn't slip. They can slip and fall when you put the keyboard on yourself tho. I drop my bluetooth mouse and broke it in two days after use.. but this keyboard is worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty amazing. By far worth the money and I can't believe this type of product is new. These should have been out years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for couch gaming
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe it took so long to come up with this product. Perfect for couch gaming. Have a Logitech mouse attached.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nagata

customer_reviews.title: Very nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it wasn't what i was looking for but the keyboard was extremely nice. One of my favorite keyboard to type on and the lapboard was real good.
customer_reviews.author: salvador fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: Wish the mouse pad area had a little grip to prevent the mouse from slipping off. u have to upgrade it for that. best decision I made couch gaming is epic
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Coyne

customer_reviews.title: keyboard section a little small for my larger hands, ...
customer_reviews.text: keyboard section a little small for my larger hands, mouse pad section very large. does offer the option to take out pads under neath, mouse pad, and wrist rest area; but there is no options for other parts currently so its mute option. do find the keys a little unresponsive at times when gaming, but hasn't been determinant to the game experience.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: It will break!
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review. They replaced it after it stopped working the first time but after using this with my 65" tv is so great, I really can't be without it now. Perfect for recliner, couch gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's pretty basic, but it does what it needs to do. I use it when I'm lounging in bed. I do recommend getting a wireless mouse though, otherwise you're going to have cables everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Amberg

customer_reviews.title: its amazing and i recommend it to anyone who plans to ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this thing, its amazing and i recommend it to anyone who plans to hook they're PC up to they're TV, just make sure your TV has low input lag and in game mode or you wont be able to hit anything if your playing FPS games or RTS.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Leschyshyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pretty unique and excellent for using a TV as a monitor
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.text: Best lap board I can find, but while using you don't have any forearm support, so for long pc gaming sessions I may use a desk still, but this is great for 1-2 hr editing sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a living room pc setup. I use this with a Logitech Proteus Core mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Truly any PC gamers' dream. Fantastic product. You may want to purchase USB cable extenders depending on how far away your are from your PC to your couch though.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: everything is perfect. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Because of my circumstances I was limited to controller gaming for three years. This product allowed me to explore the full realm of PC gaming. Layout, feel, everything is perfect. Great buy, plus it was cheaper to import from amazon than to buy loaclly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Willem Horn

customer_reviews.title: Great simple idea
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it with CPU hooked up to my tv for gaming. I like the wire management and simplicity, plus adjustable lighting on keyboard. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it it's very simple and feels very nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Treyvale

customer_reviews.title: Unable to fulfill warranty
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard has some lights not working. Customer support unable to fix or replace despite 8 months warranty remaining. Stay away from these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Mat E.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is very amazing, if you are using it on the sofa, this is the one! the design gives you lots of space to rest your hand, it is the most important parts as you very likely to use your computer over 30 mins + and it is very necessary. they keyboard is very stable,​ highly suggested.
customer_reviews.author: AppleUser

customer_reviews.title: One day then the tech is there for it to be a wireless and “work” haha this will be perfect. But 100% functions as intended
customer_reviews.text: Only thing wrong it’s its wired. One day then the tech is there for it to be a wireless and “work” haha this will be perfect. But 100% functions as intended, comfortably, and ease. Couch gaming win.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Dunce

customer_reviews.title: Great for PC gamers who don't use a desk
customer_reviews.text: Great for PC gamers who don't use a desk. Took a little getting used to but you'll adjust to the keyboard size with practice.
customer_reviews.author: derrick

customer_reviews.title: Looked into them a lot and this is the best without having to hassle with assembly
customer_reviews.text: Looked into them a lot and this is the best without having to hassle with assembly. Razr turret had a chance to dominate this market but they decided not to.
customer_reviews.author: Zippidy

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Greatvkeyboard. Wish they made a version with a 10 key.
customer_reviews.author: uhh?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: hoe is dope. use my computer in bed with my tv on my wall
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Works with Steam Link
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this lapboard. It's sturdy and comfortable. I use it with my steam link for couch gaming. It works like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Cizunas

customer_reviews.title: can play with a near desktop experience from your coach comfortably for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, can play with a near desktop experience from your coach comfortably for a few hours. Key switches feel different; however, not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product is relatively light and functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product is relatively light and functions perfectly. If you are in need of a lap keyboard this is the only one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rayson Warren

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need to buy new cord. old one is worn out already.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality,, but i wish the keyboard was a little big bigger.. Over all you wont regret it go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed alsalman

customer_reviews.title: One of the best lap keyboards out there
customer_reviews.text: One of the best lap keyboards out there. From the back lit keys to the quick break away connector to put the keyboard up. Good key response. A huge mouse pad. Comfortable pads on the back of the key board so your legs don't get sore. Two USB ports and a cable management area to wrap up the extra mouse cable. My only gripe is they show a phone holder that can be 3D printed but I have never seen plans for it.
customer_reviews.author: deathknight8338

customer_reviews.title: I rather pay the extra $ than TV dinner table for my keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance with Amazon Warehouse and got BURNED on a used one ... As far as the keyboard I can see myself using this daily so money well spent... One thing that scares me a bit is that this keyboard can be bricked via software update methinks ... so I guess I'll be avoiding those.
customer_reviews.author: MrZ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, sturdy, and the mouse bungie clip makes it easy to keep everything together no matter where you move this to. I use it both on a desk and in my lap, and it's comfortable either way!
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lapboard yet
customer_reviews.text: Lapboard works as advertised. All 4 cushions on the bottom are nice and soft (also removable). The wrist rest and mouse pad (both hard plastic) are removable as well. The mechanical keyboard keys have a good response and are all individually lit with a blue LED which can be customized with an app. The mouse pad is very large. The whole lapboard has a heavy, sturdy feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Shorting Out
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product a couple months and the keyboard is shorting out all the time and is not starting right away when computer turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Roccat Sova - Mechanical Gaming Lapboard for Gaming on the Couch with Cushion, Illuminated Backlit, Hotkeys, Programmable Keys, Quiet & Ergonomic, Brown Switch, for MMO & MOBA Games for PC – black
product_meta.description:
Style:SOVA MechanicalUnparalleled Comfort 

With the Roccat Sova PC gaming lapboard, the living room is no longer a console-only domain. Specifically designed from a durable fiber/plastic blend to bring all the control and stability of a normal desk to your lap, you can enjoy hours of top level gameplay from the comfort of your couch. The Sova has a highly ergonomic shape and also features a cushioned underside and a wrist rest, both of which are customizable. The result is a dependable platform that provides you ultimate comfort when embarking on even the longest gaming marathons; whether it’s League of Legends, WoW, Dota 2, or Star Wars.

Supreme Performance Every aspect of the Roccat Sova mechanical gaming lapboard ensures that it is far more than a comfort aid—it’s also an uncompromisingly powerful tool to get the most out of your gameplay. The integrated gaming keyboard’s TTC mechanical switches offer unrivaled sensation with every keystroke, while the mousepad is ultra-high accuracy, giving you an edge over the competition. Plus, the Sova boasts a totally lag-free connection so you’ll never fall behind the pace in MOBA or MMO gameplay. What’s more, your new lapboard gaming setup leaves you free to concentrate on the action thanks to the integrated docking rail for efficient cable management and custom clip-on parts.

Complete Customization The Roccat Sova is highly customizable to suit your individual preferences and style. The mousepad, underside cushions, and wrist rest are all replaceable in accordance with your exacting specifications—if you desire a particular material or color, it’s easily within your grasp. Furthermore, the Sova’s key backlighting is fully customizable on a per-key basis, giving you full control of your keyboard’s light configurations. With the addition of Roccat’s innovative Swarm technology to unify all your Roccat products, this gaming lapboard is prime for customization.
feature_bullets: Ergonomically designed mechanical gaming lapboard specifically made for ultra-comfortable PC gaming on your couch
Gaming keyboard included, featuring TTC mechanical switches (Sova MK) for near infinite keystroke durability. Advanced anti-ghosting with N-key rollover
High accuracy composite material mousepad and mouse bungee brings you superior precision and hassle-free operation
Keyboard is illuminated with Roccat blue key backlighting, configurable on a per-key basis so you can control the style of your lapboard
A truly customizable experience thanks to its replaceable mousepad, wrist rest and cushions, plus two USB ports to connect your favorite devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
